title: What are some steps people use to approach and solve difficult problems? - Quora
tags: Tips and Hacks for Everyday Life

response.answer_text: I take courage of my convictions that what I will do is for the greater good. And believe in what I am doing is right morally yet not necessarily legal at the time. And if necessary die by my convictions like my family member have. Stand your ground and be prepared to give life or limb for the right cause.
